arts.ttl: Magri salva al Toulouse de Carles Martínez ante el Mónaco
arts.sum: El camerunés puso el empate en el tiempo añadido de la segunda parte. Minamino puso por delante a los del Principado.

arts.ttl: Toulouse predicted XI v Monaco: Guillaume Restes and Zakaria Aboukhlal out
arts.sum: Toulouse FC are diminished as they prepare to host AS Monaco on Friday night with some key players missing through injury. There are absences across the pitch for Carles Martínez…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Toulouse: Denis Zakaria suspended, Mika Biereth to start
arts.sum: AS Monaco will be without captain Denis Zakaria when they travel to face Toulouse FC on Friday night. The Swiss international is suspended for the encounter. In Zakaria’s place, Moatasem…

Toulouse FC host AS Monaco at the Stadium de Toulouse for Matchday 25 of Ligue 1. Currently sitting eighth in the table, Toulouse are in good form, having lost just once in their last five games. Th...

arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool, Spurs, Chelsea eye Monaco's Lamine Camara
arts.sum: A bunch of big clubs, including Liverpool, Spurs and Chelsea, are interested Lamine Camara, and meanwhile Dusan Vlahovic could make way for Joshua Zirkzee and Randal Kolo Muani at Juventus. Juventus also want to renew Randal Kolo Muani's loan from Paris Saint-Germain and offload Dusan Vlahovic to make room for Zirkzee.

arts.ttl: Biereth backing up his bold words with buckets of goals for Monaco
arts.sum: When Mika Biereth joined Monaco during the winter transfer window he boldly described himself as resembling Erling Haaland in his style of play. PSG coach Luis Enrique may rest key players for Saturday’s trip to Rennes, because of the tough trip to Liverpool coming up in the Champions League.
